input_email_body:
Subject: Unanticipated Charge on Billing Statement

I encountered an unanticipated charge on my billing statement. This could have resulted from a system error or miscommunication. I have reviewed past invoices and reached out to support, but the issue still persists You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. I would greatly appreciate it if you could look into this matter and provide a resolution at your earliest convenience. My name is David Kim.
